abstract: The president is likely to face a series of comic barbs about his first debate performance, which has become prime fodder for late-night hosts.
snippet: The president is likely to face a series of comic barbs about his first debate performance, which has become prime fodder for late-night hosts.
lead_paragraph: 5:33 p.m. | Updated Perhaps looking for another outlet to reach his base constituency, President Obama has agreed to appear as a guest with Jon Stewart on Comedy Central’s “The Daily Show” on Oct. 18.

headline.main: President Obama to Appear as Guest on ‘The Daily Show’ on Oct. 18
